text.drag-n-drop-files: Select a file or add it by drag & drop. | Select up to {n} files or add them by drag & drop.
text.files-selected: No file selected. | One file selected. | {n} files selected.

error.file-type: One file has not been added as it is in the wrong format. | {n} files have not been added as they are in the wrong format.
error.file-size: One file has not been added as it exceeds the maximum file size. | {n} files have not been added as they exceed the maximum file size.
error.too-many-files: Only one file can be added. | Can not add more than {max} files.

rules.email: This field must be a valid email address.
rules.integer: This field must be an integer.

length.min: The text must not have less than {min} characters.
length.max: The text must not have more than {max} characters.
length.min-max: The text must have a length between {min} and {max} characters.

number-range.nan: This filed must be a number.
number-range.min: The number must not be smaller than {min}.
number-range.max: The number must not be bigger than {max}.
number-range.min-max: The number must be in the range from {min} to {max}.

rules.option: This field has to be an option from the list.

password.to-short: The password must have at least 8 characters.
password.no-lowercase: The password must contain a lowercase letter.
password.no-uppercase: The password must contain an uppercase letter.
password.no-digits: The password must contain a digit.
password.no-special-chars: The password must contain a special character.
password.unknown: This field does not match the required password format.

rules.phone: This field must be a valid phone number.
rules.regex: This field does not conform to the required format.
